instruction: Given two countries, find out one change they have made over time to better the environment.
output: Germany and Chile have both implemented large-scale policies to improve the environment. In Germany, the government has enacted federal laws to phase out the use of coal for electricity production and has provided grants for renewable energy investments. In Chile, the government has launched a program to expand reforestation efforts, in addition to developing efficient transportation, renewable energy technologies, and the elimination of plastic waste. Both countries have made significant investments in the environment in recent years, demonstrating their commitment to developing a sustainable future.
